dcterms:description: A standard action recognition database used for evaluating action recognition methods, containing 928 videos covering 21 action classes.
dcterms:title: JHMDB

dcterms:creator: P. Weinzaepfel
X. Martin
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: A challenging large-scale action localization dataset consisting of 31 hours of YouTube videos with spatial and temporal annotations for 10 everyday human actions.
dcterms:title: DALY (Daily Action Localization in YouTube)

dcterms:creator: S. Johnson
M. Everingham
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2000 pose annotated images of mostly sports people gathered from Flickr, used for analyzing full-body box generation methods.
dcterms:title: LSP (Leeds Sports Pose)

dcterms:creator: M. Andriluka
L. Pishchulin
P. Gehler
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A dataset covering around 400 actions with a wide range of camera viewpoints, containing approximately 17k images with annotated human poses.
dcterms:title: MPII Human Pose Dataset
